titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I celebrated the Holy Communion in the Cathedral. After lunch I went to Bradford in a horribly crowded train, and stayed the night at the Rectory. M
Woods, a vast fat man, was formerly Vicar of Auckland. D
Duff, one of the Professors at the Independent College, dined to meet me. I preached for the Bible Society in the parish church.
